help.title: SWGOH Zetas
help.text: Show a player's zeta'd characters and abilities

queries.GET_ZETAS: SELECT PlayerProfile.name, udn.text as 'unitName', abn.text as 'abilityName' FROM Skill JOIN SkillTierDefinition ON SkillTierDefinition.skillDefinitionId = Skill.id JOIN SkillDefinition ON SkillDefinition.id = SkillTierDefinition.skillDefinitionId JOIN Ability ON Ability.id = SkillDefinition.abilityReference JOIN Unit ON Unit.id = Skill.unitId JOIN PlayerProfile ON PlayerProfile.playerId = Unit.playerProfilePlayerId JOIN UnitDef ON UnitDef.id = Unit.definitionId JOIN Localization sdn ON sdn.id = SkillDefinition.nameKey AND sdn.language = 'ENG_US' JOIN Localization abn ON abn.id = Ability.nameKey AND abn.language = 'ENG_US' JOIN Localization udn ON udn.id = UnitDef.nameKey AND udn.language = 'ENG_US' WHERE SkillTierDefinition.powerOverrideTag = 'zeta' AND PlayerProfile.allyCode = ? AND (Skill.tier+2) = 8 GROUP BY PlayerProfile.name, udn.text, abn.text ORDER BY udn.text ASC, abn.text ASC
